title: Fluently
shortDesc: A React-based language tutor booking platform with secure authentication.
fullDesc: Fluently helps users find and book sessions with language tutors. It includes features like authentication, profile editing, session management, and review systemsâ€”similar to Preply or Italki.

title: PlantTick
shortDesc: A responsive React app to track monthly plant care tasks with a calendar UI.
fullDesc: PlantTick helps users manage their plant care based on monthly tips. It uses Swiper.js for a smooth calendar view, Firebase Auth, and supports dark/light theming.
challenges: Ensuring full responsiveness and managing theme state across pages.
futurePlans: Add user-specific plant tracking and email notifications.

title: EventBangla
shortDesc: A platform to discover and explore local Bangladeshi events.
fullDesc: EventBangla allows users to browse events by region, category, or popularity. Built using React Router and Firebase for secure routing and auth.
challenges: Dynamic route handling and event-based filtering across categories.
futurePlans: Add RSVP feature and event reminders.
